column4: hmmm that was nice.... like a dcc.send exploit or something....
!lamp  might have some good reading on that.
So do you have all of your hardware supported on Hoary then?
True, but I've been amazed how much can change in a year.
I probably would upgrade for the new OOo alone myself.
oo  i never mess with it.   but if i did i might agree with you.
Fair enough.  (I can't really talk here - we have a laptop running Windows 3.1 in my house.)
that's more than a year old   shame on you....   lol
Most stable Windows machine I've ever seen.
yeah.  so why upgrade something that works....   and you will see my point.
